title: Nightcap
description: Sean O'Sullivan's claims that his family's landmark bar is the victim of City Hall shenanigans only means more work for Cleo Hollings, the mayor's number one mover and shaker. Since Sean's got her busy, she decides she'll keep Mr. Testosterone busy, too...but between the sheets.Yet sleeping with the hunky O'Sullivan isn't that simple. Everyone said Sean would be inexhaustible -- even unforgettable. Nobody warned her he was lovable, too. Now other clubs' drinks taste like dust. Nothing measures up to a nightcap --with a chaser of O'Sullivan stud!
author: Kathleen O'Reilly
